alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Ozark (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 5:05PM CDT until August 08 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Ozark County in southwestern Missouri... South central Douglas County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 505 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles north of Gainesville, or 20 miles southeast of Ava, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gainesville... Hardenville... Brixey... Sycamore... Tecumseh... Dora... Rockbridge... Zanoni... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
